data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Feijoo, Alexander, Zuluaga, Luis Fernando, Molina, Ligia Janneth (2018): New species and records of earthworms (Annelida, Oligochaeta) in plantain cropping systems in Colombia's coffee-growing region. Zootaxa 4496 (1): 448-458, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.34|27 occurrences
